game.name: Synthetic Orders
game.shortDescription: A quick, hypercasual pattern-memory game. Watch the left-right yellow signals, memorize the sequence, and repeat it using two simple buttons - no grinding, no complex mechanics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A quick, hypercasual pattern-memory game. Watch the left-right yellow signals, memorize the sequence, and repeat it using two simple buttons - no grinding, no complex mechanics.
